thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 15 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Chuo Malleable Iron to offer off-floor distribution of shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chuo Malleable Iron to offer off-floor distribution of shares

organizations.name: reuters) - chuo malleable iron co ltd

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Chuo Malleable Iron Co Ltd
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 275,000 shares on Nagoya Stock Exchange, between Jan. 23 and Jan. 25
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 3,000 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/ZVbGHP
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
